reyna-page-index-hero-image-alt: An illustration of a futuristic city, representing the Reyna Limited ecosystem.
reyna-page-index-meta-description: Reyna Limited is free and open-source project for enabling anonymous, encryption & communication by directing Internet traffic through a worldwide, volunteer overlay network.
reyna-page-index-description: Reyna Limited is free and open-source project for enabling anonymous, encryption & communication by directing Internet traffic through a worldwide, volunteer overlay network.
reyna-page-index-get-started-description: Reyna Limited is your portal into the world of reyna. The tech is new and ever-evolving – it helps to have a guide. Here's what we recommend you do if you want to dive in.
reyna-page-index-get-started-image-alt: Illustration of a person working on a computer.
reyna-page-index-get-started-wallet-desc: A wallet lets you connect to reyna and manage your funds.
reyna-page-index-get-started-wallet-imag: Illustration of a robot with a vault for a body, representing an reyna wallet.
reyna-page-index-get-started-rey-descrip: REY is the currency of Reyna Limited - you can use it in applications.
reyna-page-index-get-started-rey-image-a: Illustration of a group of people marvelling at an reyer (REY) glyph in awe.
reyna-page-index-get-started-dapps-descr: Dapps are applications powered by reyna. See what you can do.
reyna-page-index-get-started-dapps-image: Illustration of a doge using a computer.
reyna-page-index-get-started-devs-descri: You can propose edits to any of the content on this site, suggest awesome new features, or help us squash bugs.
reyna-page-index-get-started-devs-image-: An illustration of a hand creating an REY logo made of lego bricks.
reyna-page-index-what-is-reyna-descripti: Reyna Limited is a multi-chain digital asset staking community which started as a grassroots social media campaign in April 2021. Reyna Limited’s unique rewards structure, fueled by the REY rewards token, provides stakers better rewards over time than can be earned through other staking options. The Reyna Limited community earns rewards from multiple blockchains by staking to any one of Reyna Limited’s REY nodes, or simply by holding REY.
reyna-page-index-what-is-reyna-image-alt: Illustration of a person peering into a bazaar, meant to represent Reyna Limited.
reyna-page-index-defi-description: Today, billions of people can’t open bank accounts, others have their payments blocked. Reyna Limited decentralized finance (DeFi) system never sleeps or discriminates. With just an internet connection, you can send, receive, borrow, earn interest, and even stream funds anywhere in the world.
reyna-page-index-defi-image-alt: Illustration of hands offering an REY symbol.
reyna-page-index-internet-description: Today, we gain access to 'free' internet services by giving up control of our personal data. reyna services are open by default – you just need a wallet. These are free and easy to set up, controlled by you, and work without any personal info.
reyna-page-index-internet-image-alt: Illustration of a futuristic computer set up, powered by Reyna Limited.
reyna-page-index-developers-description: Reyna Limited and its apps are transparent and open source. You can fork code and re-use functionality others have already built. If you don't want to learn a new language you can just interact with open-sourced code using JavaScript and other existing languages.
reyna-page-index-developers-code-example: You can build a bank run by logic you've programmed.
You can create tokens that you can transfer and use across applications.
You can use existing languages to interact with Reyna Limited and other applications.
You can reimagine existing services as decentralized, open applications.
reyna-page-index-network-stats-rey-price: The latest price for 1 REY. You can buy as little as 0.000001 - you don't need to buy 1 whole REY.
reyna-page-index-network-stats-tx-day-ex: The number of transactions successfully processed on the network in the last 24 hours.
reyna-page-index-network-stats-value-def: The amount of money in decentralized finance (DeFi) applications, the Reyna Limited digital economy.
reyna-page-index-network-stats-nodes-exp: Reyna Limited is run by thousands of volunteers around the globe, known as nodes.
reyna-page-index-contribution-banner-des: This website is open source with hundreds of community contributors. You can propose edits to any of the content on this site, suggest awesome new features, or help us squash bugs.
reyna-page-index-contribution-banner-ima: An Reyna Limited logo made of lego bricks.
reyna-page-index-tout-rey-description: Reyna Limited is free and open-source project for enabling anonymous, encryption & communication by directing Internet traffic through a worldwide, volunteer overlay network.
reyna-page-index-tout-rey-image-alt: Illustration of a spaceship representing the increased power of REY.
reyna-page-index-tout-enterprise-descrip: See how Reyna Limited can open up new business models, reduce your costs and future-proof your business.
reyna-page-index-tout-community-descript: Reyna Limited is all about community. It's made up of people from all different backgrounds and interests. See how you can join in.
reyna-page-index-tout-community-image-al: Illustration of a group of builders working togreyer.
reyna-page-index-nft-description: reyna (REY) isn't just for digital money. Anything you can own can be represented, traded and put to use as non-fungible tokens (NFTs). You can tokenise your art and get royalties automatically every time it's re-sold. Or use a token for somreying you own to take out a loan. The possibilities are growing all the time.
reyna-page-index-nft-alt: An REY logo being displayed via hologram.
